channel.title: Why cant we
channel.description: Why cant we just have a few sections where moparscapers dump all their crap, and then a more conspicuous section where the topics worth calling topics are stored (such as server downloads, client downloads/mods, server tutorials, etc)?

item.title: Why cant we
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Tico135:

But I don’t see at all why a section entirely based on garbage posts would be worth-while.

I don’t either, unless I simply don’t understand what you mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Why cant we
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It’s called the PM system. Other than that they need to keep their mouths (ok get technical, hands) shut in these kinds of situations. For example the one that happened in the downloads section was uncalled for (I assume you were referring to that), and was dealt with as soon as it was seen.

But I don’t see at all why a section entirely based on garbage posts would be worth-while.

Read full topic
